communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All electronic records of with following keywords:
- solar
- Entergy
- Nasi

The request should include emails (sent, received, BCC, and CC), email attachments, text messages, encrypted messages (such as Signal and/or WhatsApp etc.), messaging apps (such as Slack, Trello and/or Asana etc.), cloud based file storage and document systems (such as Microsoft One Drive, Google Drive, and/or Dropbox etc.), social media direct messages for professional purposes (such as Facebook and/or Twitter etc.) and any other electronic records.

Please constrain the search to the following custodians:
- Secretary Hugh McDonald

This request should search professional accounts and any personal accounts used for professional purposes.

Please include any administrative assistant(s) and chiefs of staff that may report to the named individual.

The timeframe of this public records request is between January 1, 2024 through May 7, 2024.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Daniel Tait

title: Solar for All - Dept. of E&E

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Arkansas Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All electronic records of with following keywords:
- solar for all
- solar 4 all
- EPA

The request should include emails (sent, received, BCC, and CC), email attachments, text messages, encrypted messages (such as Signal and/or WhatsApp etc.), messaging apps (such as Slack, Trello and/or Asana etc.), cloud based file storage and document systems (such as Microsoft One Drive, Google Drive, and/or Dropbox etc.), social media direct messages for professional purposes (such as Facebook and/or Twitter etc.) and any other electronic records.

Please constrain the search to the following custodians:
- Shane Khoury
- Lawrence Bengal
- Andrea Hopkins
- Mitchell Simpson

This request should search professional accounts and any personal accounts used for professional purposes.

Please include any administrative assistant(s) and chiefs of staff that may report to the named individual.

The timeframe of this public records request is between June 1, 2023 through October 31, 2023

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Sonny Albarado, a citizen of Arkansas, in coordination with Daniel Tait.

All electronic records of Becky Keogh with following keywords:

The request should include emails (sent, received, BCC, and CC), email attachments, text messages, encrypted messages (such as Signal and/or WhatsApp etc.), messaging apps (such as Slack, Trello and/or Asana etc.), cloud based file storage and document systems (such as Microsoft One Drive, Google Drive, and/or Dropbox etc.), social media direct messages for professional purposes (such as Facebook and/or Twitter etc.) and any other electronic records. 

This request should search professional accounts and any personal accounts used for professional purposes.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Sonny Albarado, a citizen of Arkansas, in coordination with Daniel Tait.

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All of the travel and gift disclosure forms filed by Register of Copyrights Shira Perlmutter during her time in office

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ben Welsh
